metadata.title: CVE-2024-35789 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:wifi: mac80211: check/clear fast rx for non-4addr sta VLAN changesWhen moving a station out of a VLAN and deleting the VLAN afterwards, thefast_rx entry still holds a pointer to the VLAN's netdev, which can causeuse-after-free bugs. Fix this by immediately callingieee80211_check_fast_rxafter the VLAN change.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
